00035 #include <vector>
00036 #include "database.h"
00037 #include "db_manager.h"
00038 using std::string;
00039 using std::vector;

00041 namespace db_planner {
00042 
00044 class SqlDatabaseManager : public DatabaseManager {
00045  private:
00047   mutable DatabaseConnection database_;
00049 
00050   ModelAllocator *model_allocator_;
00052 
00053   GraspAllocator *grasp_allocator_;
00055   string model_root_;
00056  public:
00057   SqlDatabaseManager(const string& host_name,                     
00058                      const int port,
00059                      const string& user_name,
00060                      const string& password,
00061                      const string& database_name, 
00062                      ModelAllocator *model_allocator,
00063                      GraspAllocator *grasp_allocator,
00064                      const string& connection_type = "QPSQL") 
00065                         : database_(host_name, 
00066                                     port, 
00067                                     user_name, 
00068                                     password, 
00069                                     database_name, 
00070                                     connection_type),
00071                           model_allocator_(model_allocator),
00072                           grasp_allocator_(grasp_allocator),
00073                           model_root_(getenv("CGDB_MODEL_ROOT")) {}
00074   ~SqlDatabaseManager(){delete model_allocator_; delete grasp_allocator_;}
00076   virtual bool isConnected() const {return database_.isConnected();}
00078 
00080   virtual bool GetAlignment(const Model& source,
00081                             const Model& dest, 
00082                             const string& alignment_method_name, 
00083                             float alignment[16]) const;
00085 
00086   virtual bool SaveAlignment(const Model& source,
00087                              const Model& dest, 
00088                              const string& alignment_method_name, 
00089                              const float alignment[16]) const;
00091 
00093   virtual bool GetNeighbors(const Model& model, 
00094                             const string& distance_function_name, 
00095                             const int num_neighbors,
00096                             vector<pair<Model*, double> >* neighbors) const;
00098   virtual bool SaveNeighbors(const Model& model, 
00099                              const string& distance_function_name, 
00100                              const vector<pair<Model*, double> >& neighbors) const;
00102   virtual bool GetGrasps(const Model& model, 
00103                          const string& hand_name, 
00104                          vector<Grasp*>* grasp_list) const;
00106   virtual bool SaveGrasps(const vector<Grasp*>) const;
00108   virtual bool ModelList(vector<Model*>* model_list, 
00109                                                              FilterList::FilterType filter = FilterList::NONE) const;
00111   virtual bool GraspTypeList(vector<string>* type_list) const;
00113   virtual bool DistanceFunctionList(
00114       vector<string>* distance_function_list) const;
00116   virtual bool AlignmentMethodList(
00117       vector<string>* alignment_method_list) const;
00118 };
